tool_description: Fuel prices from European Commision website
title: Europe Fuel Prices

api_list.name: Fuel price difference
api_list.description: Send a single country fuel data to the API and get € & % difference in return
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://europe-fuel-prices.p.rapidapi.com/fuel-difference"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "europe-fuel-prices.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

utterances.utterance: What is the current fuel price difference in Germany?

I need to know the fuel price change in Belgium.
What is the euro difference in fuel prices in Austria?
How has the fuel price changed in Portugal?
Tell me the fuel price difference in Sweden.
What is the current fuel price change in Greece?

api_list.name: Get specific country
api_list.description: Get fuel prices for a specific country

utterances.utterance: What are the current fuel prices in France?

I'd like to know the fuel prices in Spain.
Get me the fuel prices for the Netherlands.
What are the fuel prices in Belgium right now?
Could you tell me the fuel prices in Austria?

Please provide the fuel prices for Portugal.
What are the fuel prices in Greece?
Can you get the fuel prices for Denmark?

api_list.name: All Countries
api_list.description: Get all of Europe countries Fuel prices
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://europe-fuel-prices.p.rapidapi.com/fuel-prices"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "europe-fuel-prices.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

utterances.utterance: What are the current fuel prices across all European countries?
Can you provide the latest fuel prices for Europe?
I need to know the fuel prices in Europe right now.
Fetch the fuel prices for all countries in Europe.
Show me the current fuel prices across Europe.
What are the latest fuel prices in European countries?
Get the fuel prices for every country in Europe.
I want to see the fuel prices for all of Europe.
Provide the current fuel prices for European countries.
List the fuel prices across Europe.

api_list.name: Fuel price difference
api_list.description: Send a single country fuel data to the API and get € & % difference in return
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://europe-fuel-prices.p.rapidapi.com/fuel-difference"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "europe-fuel-prices.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://europe-fuel-prices.p.rapidapi.com/fuel-difference"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "europe-fuel-prices.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
